page.title: 07La Moye Golf Club and Course
page.content:
This is an 18 hole links course which was extended in 1979 to make it of championship length, 6,700 yds. 2 Golf Clubs operate on the course.{The {La Moye}was formed in 1902 when the course was created and has a membership of 800.{The Jersey Western is smaller, with only 50 members, and was formed in 1926. Both clubs have 7 to 10 year waiting lists for membership.
The most famous golfer coming from this course is{Aubrey Boomer}who played in the early 1900's. Since 1980 the La Moye course has been the venue of the{Jersey Open.}This takes place in June each year and attracts many golfing celebrities.
